notes_display: Obv./rev. blind spot; obv. Die cracks
issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Peroz on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with one mural elements, crescent above forehead; crescent, above this covered korymbos, two ribbons commencing to the left below crescent, pointing upwards; pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing below ball of hair, pointing upwards; earing consisting of three elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h l. o.mzdysn bgy- kdy pylwcy| mazdēsn bay Pērōz | "The Mazda-worshiping divine king Peroz"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; alter flames, rendered as four tiers of four, three, two and one strokes respectively; to the left and the right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Peroz, right hand raised, both figures facing inwards; pylwcy at 9 h; dotted border
